p: Although research teams around the world are working to explore key characteristics, pathogenesis, and combating the disease, appropriate attention should be drawn on therapeutic options and cross-resistance of other vaccines. For instance vaccines for other diseases like for measles and rubella can create cross-resistance for SARS-CoV-2. This concept of cross resistance is based on the findings that children are found less vulnerable to infection as compared to elder population and children predominantly vaccinated for measles.
